title: Personal pkgdown theme
text: Please refer https://pkgdown.r-lib.org/articles/customise.html#template-packages information. use template, package needs following line DESCRIPTION. line _pkgdown.yml. title: Get useful openair links ‚Äî href_book
code: href_book(open = FALSE, ...)  href_github(open = FALSE, ...)  href_pkgdown(package = "openair", open = FALSE, ...)

title: Get useful openair links ‚Äî href_book
text: open TRUE use utils::browseURL() open link. ... Arguments passed utils::browseURL browser non-empty character string giving name     program used HTML browser.  PATH,     full path specified.  Alternatively, R function     called invoke browser. Windows NULL also allowed (default),     implies file association mechanism used. encodeIfNeeded URL encoded     URLencode passing browser?      needed (might harmful) browser program/function     encoding, can harmful file:// URLs     systems http:// URLs passed CGI applications.     Fortunately, URLs need encoding. package href_pkgdown(); package link .

title: Get useful openair links ‚Äî href_book
text: Always returns URL, albeit invisibly open = TRUE.
